sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Input, CreateField, } from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import {MaxLengthCreator, required} from "../../utils/validators"; import ts from "./Tasks.module.css"; import GoBackButton from "../GoBackButton"; import TaskEditSaveButton from "./TaskEditSaveButton"; const TaskEditForm = (props) => { return
Completed? {CreateField("completed", "Status.completed", [], Input, {type: "checkbox"})}
Task title : {CreateField("title", "Status.title", [], Input)}
Start date : {CreateField("start date", "Status.startDate", [], Input)}
deadline : {CreateField("deadline", "Status.deadline", [], Input)}
description : {CreateField("description", "Status.description", [], Input)}
priority : {CreateField("priority", "Status.priority", [], Input)}
addedDate : {CreateField("key", "key", [], Input)}
} export default TaskEditForm
